tool_description:
Accurate localization services

Email and phone validators are already available.

We are ramping up, stay tuned for new features!
name: Localization services
title: Localization services

api_list.name: health
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://localization-services.p.rapidapi.com/health"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "localization-services.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://localization-services.p.rapidapi.com/health"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "localization-services.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
